input.sentences: the bikers began the steep climb .
they all knew there could be only one victor .
coming in second place he was n't very happy with his performance .
the jubilant smile of the victor can not be faked .
output.sentences: There was a steep climb ahead.
The pack was close together at the turn.
Each hoping to pull ahead to pass the finish line first.
There could be only one winner.
But the smiles from all those who placed shows their joy.
